programme.title: Heats, Quarter-Finals, Semi-Finals & Finals | Canoe Sprint | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Women's Canoe Single 200m Heats, the Men's Canoe Double 500m Semi-Finals, the Women's Kayak Four 500m Semi-Finals, the Men's Kayak Four 500m Semi-Finals, the Women's Canoe Single 200m Quarter-Finals, the Men's Canoe Double 500m Finals, the Women's Kayak Four 500m Finals and the Men's Kayak Four 500m Finals which took place at the Vaires-Sur-Marne Nautical Stadium on 08/08/24.
The Men's Canoe Double 500m Finals were won by Liu Hao/Ji Bowen (CHN) with Gold, Gabriele Casadei/Carlo Tacchini (ITA) with Silver and Joan Antoni Moreno/Diego Dominguez (ESP) with Bronze.
The Women's Kayak Four 500m Finals were won by New Zealand who won Gold, Germany won Silver and Hungary won Bronze.
The Men's Kayak Four 500m Finals were won by Germany who won Gold, Australia won Silver and Spain won Bronze.

programme.title: Men's 3m Springboard Final | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men's 3m Springboard Final took place at the Aquatics Centre on 08/08/24.
Xie Siyi (CHN) won Gold, Wang Zongyuan (CHN) won Silver and Osmar Olvera Ibarra (MEX) took the Bronze medal.

programme.title: GER-NED Men's Gold Medal Match | Hockey | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match took place on 08/08/2024 at Yves-du-Manoir Stadium, Paris. Netherlands claimed Gold over Germany.

programme.title: The Santiago Lange story (extended version)
programme.desc: After five Olympic Games, the Argentine sailor still hadn’t found gold. And then came cancer. Could he win in Rio?

programme.title: Men's 110m Hurdles Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 110m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 08/08/24. Grant Holloway (USA) won Gold with a time of 12.99 seconds. Daniel Roberts (USA) won Silver, and Rasheed Broadbell (JAM) completed the podium.

programme.title: Final Men's 200m | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Final took place at Stade de France, on 08/08/24. Letsile Tebogo (BOT) won Gold with a time of 19.46sec. Kenneth Bednarek (USA) took Silver, and Noah Lyles (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Final Women's 400m Hurdles | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 400m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 08/08/24. Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone (USA) won Gold with a World Record time of 50.37 seconds. Anna Cockrell (USA) won Silver, and Femke Bol (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Gabby Thomas: The Sprint to Stardom | Wait For It Paris 2024
programme.desc: Gabby Thomas sprinted into Olympic history at Paris 2024 with triple gold, including the first U.S. 200m women’s title since Allyson Felix in 2012.

programme.title: Men's Javelin Throw Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Javelin Throw Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 08/08/2024. Arshad Nadeem (PAK) won the Golden Medal, Neeraj CHOPRA (IND) Silver Medal and Anderson PETERS (GRN) Bronze Medal.

programme.title: Men's Long Jump Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Long Jump Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 06/08/2024. Miltiadis Tentoglou (GRE) won the Gold with a distance of 8.48m. Wayne Pinnock (JAM) won the Silver, Mattia Furlani (ITA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 10km | Marathon Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's 10km Marathon Swimming took place at Pont Alexandre III, France, on 09/08/2024. Kristof Rasovszky (HUN) won the Gold, with a time of 1:50:52.7 hour. Oliver Klemet (GER) won the Silver, and David Betlehem (HUN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's Boulder & Lead Finals | Sport Climbing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Boulder & Lead Finals took place at Le Bourget Sport Climbing Venue on 09/08/24. The Gold medal was won by Toby Roberts (GBR), the Silver medal was won by Sorato Anraku (JPN) and the Bronze medal was won by Jakob Schubert (AUT).

programme.title: Women's 3m Springboard Final | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Women's 3m Springboard Final took place at the Aquatics Centre on 09/08/24.
Chen Yiwen (CHN) won Gold, Keeney Maddison (AUS) won Silver and Chang Yani (CHN) took the Bronze medal.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 14 | Canoe Sprint | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session contains the Women's Canoe and Kayak Doubles 500m Semi-Finals and Finals, the Men's Kayak Double 500m Semi-Finals and Finals and the Men's Canoe Single 1000m Semi-Finals and Finals which took place at the Vaires-Sur-Marne Nautical Stadium on 09/08/24.
The Women's Canoe Double 500m Final was won by Xu /Sun (CHN) with Gold, Luzan/Rybachok (UKR) took silver and Mackenzie/Vincent (CAN) with Bronze.
The Women's Kayak Double 500m Final was won by Carrington/Hoskin (NZL) with Gold, Csipes/Gazso (HUN) with Silver and a tie in Bronze for Paulina Paszek/Julie Marie Hake (GER) and Pupp/Fojt (HUN).
The Men's Kayak Double 500m Final was won by Schopf/Lemke (GER) with Gold, Bence Nadas/Totka (HUN) with Silver and Van Der Westhuyzen/Green (AUS) with Bronze.
The Men's Canoe Single 1000m Final was won by Martin Fuksa (CZE) with Gold, Isaquias Queiroz (BRA) with Silver and Serghei Tarnovschi (MDA) with Bronze.

programme.title: Men's & Women's Sprint | Cycling Track | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session contains the Women's Sprint Qualifications, the Men's Sprint Semi-Finals, the Women's Sprint 1/32 Finals and the Women's Sprint 1/32 Finals Repechages which took place at the Saint-Quentin-En-Yvelines Velodrome on 09/08/24.

programme.title: Men's Bronze Medal Match IND-ESP | Hockey | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Bronze ,Medal Match with India and Spain took place on the 08/08/2024 at the Yves-du-Manoir Stadium - 2. Final Score IND 2:1 ESP.

programme.title: Personal Best: Paris 2024
programme.desc: Relive the Paris 2024 Olympic Games through the journeys of eight remarkable athletes who pushed past limits, defied expectations, and inspired the world. Featuring Noah Lyles, Faith Kipyegon, Jack Robinson, Huang Yaqiong and Zheng Siwei, Leon Marchand, Olga Kharlan and Cindy Ngamba.

programme.title: Hockey vs Cricket with Savita Punia and Smriti Mandhana | Sports Swap India
programme.desc: India’s national hockey team goalkeeper Savita Punia swaps her hockey stick for a cricket bat. Can her skills in hockey help her become a better cricketer?

programme.title: Men's 3m Springboard Final | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men's 3m Springboard Final took place at the Aquatics Centre on 08/08/24.
Xie Siyi (CHN) won Gold, Wang Zongyuan (CHN) won Silver and Osmar Olvera Ibarra (MEX) took the Bronze medal.

programme.title: Men's Park Finals | Skateboarding | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Skateboarding Park Finals took place on La Concorde 4, France, 07/08/24. Keegan Palmer (AUS) won Gold with a total score of 221.9. Tom Schaar (USA) won the Silver Medal and Augusto Akio (BRA) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: FRA-POL - Men's Gold Medal Match | Volleyball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match took place at South Paris Arena 1, Paris, on 10/08/2024. France won Gold with a final score FRA 3:0 POL.

programme.title: ESP-AUS - Women's Gold Medal Match | Water Polo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Gold Medal Match took place at Paris La Defense Arena, Paris, on 10/08/2024. Spain won Gold with a final score ESP 11:9 AUS.

programme.title: Michael Bodegas, the Strongman of Italy’s Water Polo Team | Splash In
programme.desc: Olympic Bronze Medallist and World Champion Michael Bodegas says it is the friendship and camaraderie that draw him to water polo. Watch his inspiring story. Soundtrack: ArrDee, Oliver Twist

programme.title: Sarah Sjostrom, Sweden’s Swimming Superstar | Splash In
programme.desc: When Sarah slipped and broke her elbow a few months before Tokyo 2020, her fans thought she may not even compete at the Olympics. She fought back, accelerated the recovery, and ended up winning silver in the 50 free. She currently holds 5 World Records and is eyeing Paris 2024 to add new achievements. Soundtrack: Mabel, Let Them Know

programme.title: Molly Carlson, Canada’s Brave High Diver | Splash In
programme.desc: She started as a gymnast, then switched to diving, before specializing in high diving (20m) because that is what bravery is to her. Along the journey, she learned how to deal with mental health struggles, an experience that she now shares with her fans as a mental health advocate and founder of the #bravegang. Soundtrack: Bastille, Shut Off The Lights

programme.title: Michael Andrew, Team USA’s Record-Breaking Machine | Splash In
programme.desc: He was a teenager when he started breaking US national age group records. Over the course of his career, he broke more than 100 national records. At Tokyo 2020, he helped team USA break the world record in the 4 x 100 medley relay and won his first Olympic Gold. Soundtrack: Glass Animals, Heat Waves

programme.title: Women's Boulder & Lead Finals | Sport Climbing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Boulder & Lead Finals took place at Le Bourget Climbing Venue, France, on 10/08/2024. Janja Garnbret (SLO) won the Gold with a total of 168.5 points. Brooke Raboutou (USA) won the Silver and Jessica Pilz (AUT) completed the podium.

programme.title: Duets Free Routine Final | Artistic Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Duets Free Routine Final took place at the Aquatics Centre, on 10/08/24. Liuyi Wang/Quianyi Wang (CHN) won Gold, Kate Shortman/Isabelle Thorpe (GBR) won Silver and Bregje de Brouwer/Noortje de Brouwer (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: JPN-CHN - Women's Team Gold Medal Match | Table Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This Women's Team Gold Medal Match Japan v China, at South Paris Arena 4, Paris, on 10/08/24. Final score CHN 3:0 JPN.
China won Gold, Japan won Silver and South Korea won Bronze.

programme.title: B-Boys Final | Breaking | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The B-Boys Final took place on La Concorde 1, Paris, on 10/08/2024. Phil Wizard (CAN) won the Gold, Danny Dann (FRA) claimed the Silver, and Victor (USA) won the Bronze.

programme.title: Dakar breakers see new opportunities with Olympic debut| Breaking Life
programme.desc: With a classical and traditional African dance background, B-Boy Zaza is a key member of Power Crew, one of the most successful crew in Senegal. Joined by his young brother Emma, their crew is more like a family and made them travel to major global events. Now a teacher, tasked with navigating the challenges of his community, the dance gives him hope for a brighter future. With Paris 2024 and Dakar Youth Olympic Games in 2026, the elders and next generation alike to build their own future and for the sport as it takes roots in Senegal. Organized by the local dance federation, they participate in the Battle National, featuring some of Senegal’s best emerging talents.

programme.title: India’s growing breaking scene makes room for B-Girls | Breaking Life
programme.desc: India’s Breaking scene started in the early 2000’s and has since exploded in popularity. While mostly male dominated, women are increasingly accepted and celebrated in the Indian Breaking scene. We meet B-Girl Jo, the two-time BC One India champion from Bangalore, as she travels alone to Mumbai. There, she meets her friend Flying Machine who organizes a community celebration event where B-Girls have a chance to battle it out. As a leader for Indian female hip-hop dancers, Jo reflects on her position in the society. With her own hip-hop and yoga studio and inspired by the challenges she’s already had to overcome, she examines her journey with both excitement and wisdom.

programme.title: French breakers set the scene for Paris 2024 Olympic Games| Breaking Life
programme.desc: France is a cultural melting pot. It’s also one of the biggest countries for Breaking with more than a thousand battles every year and some of the greatest international competitions. It’s also in Paris 2024 that Breaking will make its Olympic debut. Dany Dann came to France from French Guyana to pursue a life in dance. Now, he juggles early morning shifts as a nurse, daily training and being a father – always with an eye on the next battle. Now reigning national champion, he trains with French national team members B-Girl Carlota and B-Boy Marlone for the WDSF World Breaking Championship in Paris.

programme.title: Young breakers take over the streets of Medellin | Breaking Life
programme.desc: Colombia used to be one of the most dangerous countries in the world but has found new life through a revival in urban arts, becoming a global creative mecca. B-Girl Luma and 4Eskuela hip hop school, where she learnt Breaking and is now a teacher, have been instrumental to this change in Medellin (Colombia). But it’s not been an easy journey for Luma who also had her doubts about what she can really achieve through dancing. By winning international dance events around the world, she is now confident it gave her a career and a drive, also when teaching young kids in her neighbourhood. She is keen to participate to Paris 2024.

programme.title: Men's Final | Modern Pentathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Modern Pentathlon Men's Final took place at Château de Versailles, Paris on 10/08/24. Ahmed Elgendy (EGY) won the Gold Medal, Taishu Sato (JPN) won the Silver medal and the Bronze medal was for Giorgio Malan (ITA).

programme.title: USA-FRA - Men's Gold Medal Game | Basketball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Gold Medal Game took place at Bercy Arena, France, on 10/08/2024. The United States of America won the Gold with a final score: USA 98:87 FRA.
